templateContent.thank1: Thank you for your kind words! We're glad to hear that the classes are helping. Your child's progress is our greatest motivation.
templateContent.thank2: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! We're committed to providing the best learning experience for every student.

templateContent.apologize2: We're sorry that the experience didn't meet your expectations. Please contact us directly so we can address your concerns.
templateContent.explain1: Thank you for your feedback. We're constantly working to improve our teaching methods and materials.
templateContent.explain2: We appreciate your honest review. Your suggestions are valuable for our continuous improvement.
templateContent.encourage1: Keep up the great work! We believe every student can achieve their goals with dedication.
templateContent.encourage2: Learning is a journey. Thank you for trusting us to be part of your child's education.
